assetRequirements.purpose: To capture the essence of springtime in Italy, showcasing the blooming nature and cultural experiences.
assetRequirements.visual_style: colorful and warm, reflecting the beauty of Italy in spring
assetRequirements.content_context: Highlight the cultural richness and gastronomic delights of Italy during spring.

assetRequirements.purpose: To visually represent specific locations mentioned, such as Rome and Tuscany.
assetRequirements.visual_style: natural and scenic, focusing on landscapes and local culture
assetRequirements.content_context: Showcase the beauty of blooming meadows in Tuscany and Easter celebrations in Rome.
